channel.title: Who wants Old Rs Back?
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i56.tinypic.com/163zic.jpg[/img][/center] Guys im planning on gathering some serious stuff together here...i was just watching videos of old runescape, and i have been waiting for an old rs version to be made and hosted.Yet nobody has accomplished this matter.So If i create a very similiar version not to be perfect but my own base hosted very well on high gig.Create same old rs version forums,highscores etc.
[center]2OO6 Reminder http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ywd_0TS05zs&feature=related[/center]
[center]Would you Play?[/center]
[center]Become a Member having good memorys back?[/center]
[center]Then lets start this generation and return it![/center]
[center]Post now tell me what you think and if its worthit![/center]
[center]Bringing back 2006 I can feel it allready...[/center]
[center]Thankyou much regards..Shardyboy[/center]
[center][b]Development Begins[/b][/center]
[center][i]29/6/11 Tutorial Island[/i]
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2z4hi0z.jpg[/img]
[b]Media 464[/b] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/4r5avs.jpg[/img][/center]

4) New topics: You must post at least a few pictures of your Development. If you do not, we cannot believe you. You may substitute this with a video. Why pictures/video? So you have proof you did something. Also, topic titles must follow this.

[/quote]This, please fix within 24 hours.

item.title: Who wants Old Rs Back?
item.dc:creator: @x-logic x-logic
item.description:
@x-logic wrote:

iz3 legend:

When someone manually writes a server than can hold 200,000+ people and includes every runescape feature ill take my words back. Until then im no longer debating this.

Looks like a job for me ;p but yea the max players on a rs server is 2048 becasue of the buffer size limt. Also the way they do rendering on 600ms cyle is very limting. But just to let you know I have writen the new rs-reborn servers to handle easy over 2048 players(this is with content)

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:17, topic:401499”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=498558.msg3646091#msg3646091 date=1309382476]
yes without lag. You get a server with 2000 people on it and see what happens. Near reality lags and it has 1000…
[/quote]
That could be one of two reasons… A. They have server sided lag or B. There dedicated server cant handle 1000+ players without lag. i bet if i spent enough money on a dedicated server i could run winterlove with 2000 players and no lag[/quote]

Well it will have to be very powerfull in order to keep up the 600ms rendering cyle, I also guess it handles the packet processing on this too which will hold rendering up. Ok let just say we have 2048 players on and all we have to do is render them forget everything like encoding, content, decoding, connection. It would have to take the same or less time than 0.29296875ms (600 / 2048) for each player which winterlove base will not be able to do without a very powerfull dedicated server behide it.

Read full topic

item.title: Who wants Old Rs Back?
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

iz3 legend:

Im suspose to beleive that 2 - 4 people can add over 6000+ item’s with flawless stats, 50+ quests with exact dialouge, and 3000+ Npc’s which 70% of have been modeled wrong in the current available client’s.

Seeing as you can just rip stats from like runewiki, that’s not difficult. Skills take a few days to make, max. Same for quests.

70% of modelling wrong on most clients? What are you even on about? Is it that difficult to extract a new client and de-compile it? I did that to 5 clients earlier just to figure out their revisions…

Read full topic

item.title: Who wants Old Rs Back?
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

iz3 legend:

What you guys dont seem to understand about this is that it took Jagex a team of 40+ expert coders almost a year to code Runescape 2 beta. You guys are planning to do it in a month or shorter. I have little faith any remake will make it, but ill support you.

What you don’t seem to realize is that Jagex had to make models and maps, items, npcs, a game engine, all that. We already have all of those things, so most of the work has been done for us.

Read full topic
